title: FLS5: Locking X-/Cap-/Ascender- lines
content:
Perhaps I'm just dense and am overlooking the obvious here, but is there anyway to lock the positions of the vertical metrics guidelines in FLS \*without\* locking the reference line? (by which I mean the red dotted guideline which is used for measuring sidebearings). View-\>Lock Layers-\>Vertical Metrics seems to affect both.

TIA

Andr√©
